explanations.c: Correct: FAES stands for Flame Atomic Emission Spectrometry

questions.question: Interference type color filters is present in

explanations.a: Incorrect: Color filters are used in optical components
explanations.b: Correct: Interference filters are part of the optical system
explanations.c: Incorrect: Photo detector detects light, doesn't use filters
explanations.d: Incorrect: Nebuliser is for aerosol generation
